text:
ap_fdopen for logfiles does not specify O_LARGEFILE and therefore apache stops
working when logfiles grow > 2GB
creator: apache-bugzilla@suspekt.org
apache-bugzilla@suspekt.org
text:
ehmm the function is actually

ap_pfopen()

This is fixed in 2.0.50, not sure if anyone is interested in doing the work for
1.3 too.  Opening all files with O_LARGEFILE is probably a bad idea so I'd guess
it requires an interface change.
